price: 73. »En él tendréis fruta en abundancia de la que podréis comer».
arabic: لَكُمۡ فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٞ كَثِيرَةٞ مِّنۡهَا تَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: lakum fīhā fākihatun kathīratun min'hā takulūna
